description: CodebaseBranch is the Schema for the CodebaseBranches API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: CodebaseBranchSpec defines the desired state of CodebaseBranch.

fromCommit.description:
FromCommit is a commit hash or branch name.
The new branch will be created starting from the selected commit hash or branch name.
If a branch name is provided, the new branch will be created from the latest commit of that branch.

pipelines.description: Pipelines is a map of pipelines related to the branch.

release.description: Flag if branch is used as "release" branch.

version.description: Version of the branch. It's required for versioning type "semver".

status.description: CodebaseBranchStatus defines the observed state of CodebaseBranch.

detailedMessage.description:
Detailed information regarding action result
which were performed

failureCount.description: Amount of times, operator fail to serve with existing CR.

git.description: Specifies a status of action for git.

lastTimeUpdated.description: Information when the last time the action were performed.

status.description: Specifies a current status of CodebaseBranch.

username.description: Name of user who made a last change.

value.description: Specifies a current state of CodebaseBranch.
